SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Client

Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Client.ClientManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientListener, ClientUpdateListener, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, GuiMaster
public abstract class ClientManager extends Object implements ClientListener, ClientUpdateListener, Runnable
The class ClientManager serves as a base class for managing the client-side functionality. It implements the ClientListener and ClientUpdateListener interfaces and provides a mechanism to handle different types of messages received from the server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientManager()
    Constructs a ClientManager object and starts a new thread for running the message handling loop.
